title: Frieze, 1905–15
inscribed: Printed in selvedge: "Mr. (?) Beck & CO." Pattern No. "6464"
description:
Flitter frieze containing rose swags outlined in mica flakes. Strung beads in gold suspended from gold fleur-de-lis. Printed on grounding that shades from light blue at the top to darker blue at bottom. Top and bottom have bands of gold mica flakes. Printed in pinks, greens, white, yellow, with outlines in gold mica flakes.
Printed in selvedge: "Mr. (?) Beck & CO." Pattern No. "6464"

tombstone.epitaph:
Frieze, 1905–15.
1905–15. Machine-printed, mica flakes. Gift of Victorian Collectibles. 1979-91-504.
